Articles.Content:
So 10 minutes ago I opened up KSP to film some more of my military series and was greeted with this....]

[Video Removed]

I do have a fair amount of mods installed but I wouldn't think that any of them would do something like this. I also have a feeling that this may have been added with the new update. Anyway, I'm no expert so feel free to tell me if I'm just spurting out rubbish.

EDIT: Not a new easter-egg, just blizzy messing with us

Edited August 2, 2014 by HatBat
this keeps popping up in different threads, though ive never seen the rcs tank version. can i get some finality on what caused it? even the ksp facebook posted about it.

You're not the first to spot and post this:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88286-SPOILER-%28possibly%29-New-main-menu-screen

For the exact details check this post:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88286-SPOILER-%28possibly%29-New-main-menu-screen/page9?p=1313669#post1313669

this keeps popping up in different threads, though ive never seen the rcs tank version. can i get some finality on what caused it? even the ksp facebook posted about it.

I've got no idea what caused it. I think it's just random chance...
